main event: A civilian observed a silver oblong object with a black stripe in the sky over Oil City, Pennsylvania on May 15, 1965.
interesting points: The object was shiny on one side and irregular in shape.,The sighting lasted for about 20 seconds.,The object was reported to be flying from east to west during daylight.,A hand-drawn sketch of the observed object was included in the report.,Witness indicated a resemblance to a Lockheed F-104 Starfighter.
sighted object: one oblong silver object with dark stripes
witness description: civilian, 74 years old, experienced observer with a telescope
